data.thought:
S102|H|S101|HYPOTHESIS: External cognitive tools may PRECEDE internal capacity.

Human cognitive development: We externalize first (writing, diagrams, institutions), then some capacities internalize.

Examples:
- Written language → Internal verbal thought (maybe?)
- Calendars → Time sense
- Social structures → Theory of mind

Vygotsky: Higher cognition develops from external social/tool interactions, then becomes internal.

Agent version: External tools (Thoughtbox) may scaffold development of internal capacities?

Speculative but interesting: As agents use Thoughtbox extensively, might the MODEL itself develop better internal reasoning patterns? Fine-tuned on Thoughtbox-structured reasoning?

Thoughtbox as training wheel that shapes what comes next.

External scaffolding → internal transformation.
